name: export-wins-ui-mi
description: An MI dashboard for Data Hub

scripts.clean: if [ -d coverage ]; then rm -r coverage; fi;
scripts.test-mock-unit: NODE_ENV=development; LOG_LEVEL=error; STUB_MI=false; FAKE_MI=false; MOCK_MI=true; JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=src/test/app/jasmine.json jasmine
scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=development; LOG_LEVEL=error; STUB_MI=false; FAKE_MI=false; MOCK_MI=false; JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=src/test/app/jasmine.json jasmine
scripts.test:unit:debug: NODE_ENV=development; LOG_LEVEL=error; STUB_MI=false; FAKE_MI=false; MOCK_MI=false; JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=src/test/app/jasmine.json node --inspect node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js
scripts.coverage: npm run clean; NODE_ENV=development; LOG_LEVEL=error; STUB_MI=false; FAKE_MI=false; MOCK_MI=false; JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=src/test/app/jasmine.json nyc jasmine
scripts.test:integration: cd src/test/ci/; ./setup.sh; node wait.js && JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=jasmine.json jasmine
scripts.test:integration:local: export TEST_BROWSER='chrome'; export TEST_HOST='10.200.10.1'; export TEST_PORT=${SERVER_PORT}; cd src/test/ci/; ./setup.sh; node wait.js && JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=jasmine.json jasmine
scripts.watch-stub: export STUB_MI=true; export FAKE_MI=false; npm run watch
scripts.watch-fake-stub: export STUB_MI=true; export FAKE_MI=true; npm run watch
scripts.watch-mock-fake-stub: export MOCK_MI=true; export STUB_MI=true; export FAKE_MI=true; npm run watch
scripts.dist: npm run build:dist && npm run start

author: Graham Veal
